references.paper_title: Controlling the false discovery rate: a practical and powerful approach to multiple testing
references.reason: This paper introduces the concept of false discovery rate, a crucial concept for multiple hypothesis testing, which is directly applied in this research.

references.paper_title: High-dimensional statistics with a view toward applications in biology
references.reason: This paper provides a comprehensive overview of high-dimensional statistics, which is the foundation of the methods used in this research.

references.paper_title: Uniform post-selection inference for least absolute deviation regression and other z-estimation problems
references.reason: This paper develops robust inference methods for high-dimensional linear models, which is the theoretical basis of the methods proposed in this study.

references.paper_title: On asymptotically optimal confidence regions and tests for high-dimensional models
references.reason: This paper provides theoretical guarantees for high-dimensional inference procedures, which is essential for establishing the validity of the proposed methods.
This book provides a comprehensive overview of statistical foundations in data science, which is crucial for understanding the broader context of this research.
